mapper.update: CREATE TABLE h_users ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, role_id NUMERIC(10), created_at NUMERIC(20), updated_at NUMERIC(20) )
CREATE TABLE h_roles ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(500), created_at NUMERIC(20), updated_at NUMERIC(20) )

CREATE TABLE h_menus ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, url VARCHAR(255), parent_id NUMERIC(10) DEFAULT -1, order_index NUMERIC(10) DEFAULT 0, created_at NUMERIC(20), updated_at NUMERIC(20) )
CREATE TABLE h_role_menus ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, role_id INT NOT NULL, menu_id INT NOT NULL )
